attributes.action: Implement an immediate reduction in fuel duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A recent newspaper report stated that the Treasury has had a £3bn windfall from Fuel Duty, enough to be able to implement an immediate reduction of 6p on fuel duty. With the way oil prices are rocketing, the government would show by doing this that it cares about the needs of the people, and does not bury it's head in the sand on the hard issues.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
